extension.summary: Navega con Kodi por páginas web.
extension.description: Navega con Kodi por páginas web para ver sus videos de manera fácil.
Browse web pages using Kodi, you can easily watch their video content.
extension.disclaimer: [COLOR red]The owners and submitters to this addon do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by these addons nor do they have any affiliation with the content providers.[/COLOR]
